how i made it through university without.details: On the first week of posting it, I had a few likes
Jaevionn was thinking of mentioning my blog post during a discussion
Jaevionn said he: Recommended your blog to someone the other day about how to finance uni without slb. He's also from Clarendon.
Mr. Judon person said: 'Good advice for the youths'
My Linux friend, Tedley said: your new blog on school without loans is on my hitlist as soon as I get home #selfeducation.
Jaevionn said the person (he had shared the post with) went and apply. I quote: 'BTW the guy I sent your blog said he went and applied for the stuff'
Was offered an opportunity to blog on the Geezam platform.
